page.title: 13SARRE HOMELIFE
page.content: My dad works on a farm and drives tractors and since I've been at Sarre the Baxters Farm have got two new tractors and my dad drives one and it is a white one and my mum goes potato picking.She might be going on the calabrese which is a kind of vegetable. I live in Sarre and they are doing the houses up. We have a dog and her name is Pippa and I have a brother and sister and they both go to Frank Montgomery School. I go to Chislet Primary School. I do not think we should have houses built in Sarre. At my school we go swimming and we go at one o'clock and we are back at half past two. Where I live the number of our house is three. We have lived in Sarre for one and a half years but I liked it where I lived before that was Hoath.
